name: Note Taker
description: A simple note taking app. Create, edit, and delete notes in your browser.

name: Text Editor
description: A text editor that runs in the browser. The app is a single-page application that meets the PWA criteria.

name: Tech Blog Backend
description: This is a backend tech blog project that allows user to post a blog. Users are able to create accounts with secure password with the ability of hashing and storing.

name: Fresh Tomatoes
description: A project where all the popular movies are fetched from API and displayed
